LanguageData.CommandOfficeTableToggleDescActive: This room is designated as your mayor's office. If you have a mayor, they will hold meetings here.
LanguageData.CommandOfficeTableToggleDescInactive: You can assign this room to be used as your mayor's office, if you have one. You can only give your mayor one office.
